column2: In Barad-Dur, many of your most capable lieutenants reside. They handle the daily tasks of running your realm, and keep your unruly legions under control.

You have gathered to yourself an inner circle, loyal only to yourself. These include orcs, Uruk-Hai, Half-Orcs, and Dunlendings. They take care of all the drudgery associated with ruling a realm and building armies.
column3: @FIXME@ You have gathered to yourself an inner circle, loyal only to yourself. These include orcs, Uruk-Hai, Half-Orcs, and Dunlendings. They take care of all the drudgery associated with ruling a realm and building armies.

column2: Maiar characters are not supposed to be randomly spawned. So, you will be an Orc
Istari characters are not supposed to be randomly spawned. So, you will be Human of Dunlending culture.
Wight characters are not supposed to be randomly spawned. So, you will be an Orc
Umaiar characters are not supposed to be randomly spawned. So, you will be a more ordinary evil race
